price: Kapag binigkas sa kanila ang Qur’ān ay hindi sila nagpapatirapa.
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
